name: Skeleton Horde
description: The Skeleton Horde is a large, menacing collection of animated bones capable of attacking both from melee and ranged distances, equipped with a shortsword and a shortbow.
memorable: Its ability to deal substantial piercing damage with coordinated attacks makes it a significant threat, especially considering its damage immunity to poison.
goals: To overwhelm enemies with numbers and tactical strikes.
relations: Often found in the company of other undead or necromancers.
environment: Typically found in graveyards, ruins, or places of death.
strengths: Damage immunity to poison and condition immunities to fatigue and poisoned states.
attacks: Utilizes a shortsword for close combat and a shortbow for ranged assaults, both capable of delivering devastating piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Its impressive dual capability of melee and ranged attacks allows it to adapt to various combat scenarios.
additional_information: Does not require air, sustenance, or sleep.
Uses coordinated attacks to maximize damage output.
Can halve damage dealt when bloodied.
Possesses a decent Dexterity, enhancing its ranged capabilities.
Average Constitution contributes to its durability.
